Html:
Hey guys,

I've been trying to get this working for a solid 4 hours now. I'm trying to get something to look like:
Example 1: Test title
but I need the "1" to be a numbered list so if the item is copy and pasted later, it continues to increment.

My problem is I've gotten it down to show up like:
Example
1: Test title
Right now, I have:
 $cell->addText('Example',$font,$style);
 $cell->addListItem('Test title', 0, null, 'multilevel');
(plus some attempts at styling)



Is this possible? Or am I wasting my time?
